channel.title: Custom item error
channel.description: i read a tut and i added my custom item id to item.java and added details to item.cfg the error i get when running server is: _______________________________________________________________ exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 14 at itemhandler.loaditemlist(itemhandler.java:346) at itemhandler.<init>(itemhandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) ________________________________________________________________ please this is only what i want to know How do i fix these errors? Are these errors causing the freeze in connection from client to server? How do i successful get items put into server(what do i really edit in server files)?

item.title: Custom item error
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

I have an idea, why don’t you just take your item out of item.cfg, and take whatever else you did with custom item that created the error, that’s the only way i think you can fix that, unless theres something you typed wrong. Try going through what you did and if you can’t find any problems delete. Next time you try to do it follow the tutorial a little better, or get to understand it more.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom item error
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

i read a tut and i added my custom item id to item.java and added details to item.cfg
the error i get when running server is:

exception in thread “main” java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 14
at itemhandler.loaditemlist(itemhandler.java:346)
at itemhandler.(itemhandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:28)

please this is only what i want to know
How do i fix these errors?
Are these errors causing the freeze in connection from client to server?
How do i successful get items put into server(what do i really edit in server files)?
